title: Eliminate a Variable
text: The equations are already in standard form. The coefficients of x are already opposite.

title: Solve for y
text: x will be eliminated and then solve for y. $$-2y=-6$$ $$y=3$$

title: Substitute and Solve for x
text: Substitute $$y=3$$ into one of the original equations and solve for x. $$5x+2y=1$$ $$5x+2\times3=1$$ $$5x+6=1$$ $$x=-1$$

title: Solution as Ordered Pair
text: Solution to the system of equations is (-1,3).
